   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to PL-kNN's documentation!
================================================

This comprehensive package encompasses the entire source code of PL-kNN, a cutting-edge model strategically crafted to alleviate the intricacies associated with selecting the k parameter in the conventional k-NN classifier. The primary objective of this package is to provide a user-friendly experience, mirroring the intuitive approachability of the widely-used scikit-learn modules. Users can seamlessly navigate and leverage the capabilities of PL-kNN for enhanced flexibility and efficiency in their machine learning endeavors.

PL-kNN is compatible with **Python 3.5+**.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   modules
